comments:
When trying to debug against remote servere, there is exception accepted:
(Connection to the server can be established from another platform (Linux))


org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Unable to connect to Web Server. Web Server may not be started. 
	at org.eclipse.php.debug.core.debugger.PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.connect(PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.java:59)
	at org.eclipse.php.debug.core.debugger.PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.debug(PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.java:44)
	at org.eclipse.php.debug.core.launching.PHPServerLaunchDelegate.runPHPWebServer(PHPServerLaunchDelegate.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.php.debug.core.launching.PHPServerLaunchDelegate$RunDispatchJobWebServer.run(PHPServerLaunchDelegate.java:196)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

In the Linux machines there is following exception accepted.

org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Unable to connect to Web Server. Web 
Server may not be started. 
	at 
org.eclipse.php.debug.core.debugger.PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.connect(PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.java:59)
	at 
org.eclipse.php.debug.core.debugger.PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.debug(PHPWebServerDebuggerInitializer.java:44)
	at 
org.eclipse.php.debug.core.launching.PHPServerLaunchDelegate.runPHPWebServer(PHPServerLaunchDelegate.java:109)
	at 
org.eclipse.php.debug.core.launching.PHPServerLaunchDelegate$RunDispatchJobWebServer.run(PHPServerLaunchDelegate.java:196)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Please check whether the remote host is accessible, and "zend_debugger.allow_hosts" directive in PHP.ini on the remote host is set properly.
